name: Sorcery Party
description:
Sorcery Party is a local multiplayer game where players fight each other to extract magic from crystals that appear throughout the stage.

Minimum: 2 players

Maximum: 4 players

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Developer's definition of party: Short term acts of fun which potentially lead to future of irreversible regrets.

Story: A band of sorcerers and sorceresses became bored as they reach the pinnacle of their careers. To spice things up, they created an alternate reality where they pour their magical powers to create magical crystal and play a game. Winner gets their magic back, while the rest lose their magic power forever.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

This game is created as part of the final major project in SAE Perth on Trimester 2 of 2018.

Please note that the game currently only take input from XInput compatible controller such as XBox 360 and XBoxOne.

Download includes release for both 32 bit and 64 bit version of Windows.
